system.effect: Weapon hit creates Area of Effect explosion of X Metre radius. Roll Damage once and apply to everyone within this area. Dodging Area of Effect Attacks requires moving up to Agility Bonus Metres to leave explosion radius, auto-fail dodge if this is not possible.

description.value: Weapon hit creates Area of Effect explosion of X Metre radius. Roll Damage once and apply to everyone within this area. Dodging Area of Effect Attacks requires moving up to Agility Bonus Metres to leave explosion radius, auto-fail dodge if this is not possible.
